p.s: Her onginneð se þridda flod of ðam neorxnawanglican wylle, þe þurh þone gyldenan muþ forð aarn þæs halgan papan & biscopes sancte Gregories, þone Romane for þæra fægran worda gyfe Os Avrevm nemniað.

On þam flode he wæs sprecende be haligra manna wundrum & þeawum, swa he ær dyde on þam ærrum bocum, & þus wæs cweþende: Nu ic þus swiðe behealde þa neahfædras, þe mid us wæron, maran & geþungenran manna dæda ic forlet, swa þæt me þynceþ of gemynde beon Paulines wundor Nolane burge biscopes, se manige mæn þara, þe ic gemunde, ægþer ge on tida gegange ge eac on wundrum oferþeah.
Þurh witena sægena us gecyðde se mæra nama & þa wundorlican weorc þæs arwyrðan weres Paulines, þara witena gesægene, þe be him sægdon, ic mæg gelyfan, efne swa ic hit mid minum eagum gesawe.

Hit gelamp in þam dagum, þa þa Wandale swiþost ricsodon, þæt forhergod wæs Langbeardna rice, & manige men wæron alædde of þam lande in Affricaland, se drihtnes wer Paulinus gesealde wædligendum mannum eall, þæt ðe to his biscoprices bryce belamp.

& þa he nawiht næfde, þe he mihte biddendum sellan, þa sume dæge com to him an wydewe, seo sæde him, þæt hire sunu wære gelæded in hæftnyde fram Wænla cyngces aðume, & bæd þone Godes wer, þæt he hire his wliteweorþ gesealde, þæt heo mihte hire sunu mid alysan, gif þæt his hlaford onfon wolde & hire geunnan, þæt he eft mid hire ham gecyrde.
Ac se Godes wer georne sohte, hwæt he mihte syllan þam biddendum wife & nawiht ne funde mid him buton hine sylfne.
Þa andswarode he þam biddendum wife & cwæð: nat ic hwæt ic þe sylle elles buton me sylfne.
Nim me & sæge, þæt ic þin rihtþeowa sy, & syle me on þeowdome for hine, þæt þu þinne sunu eft onfo.
Þa heo þis gehyrde of þam muþe swa myccles weres, heo wende, þæt hit ma wære bysmrung þonne efensargung.

& he þa, swa swa he wæs se getingesta wer & mid utancumenum brocum oft gelæred, þæt tweogende wif hraðe oncneow, þæt heo him ne gelyfde, & he þa cwæð: ne tweo þu na, þæt þu sylle þisne biscop on þeowdome, to þon þæt þu þinne sunu eft onfo.
Hi þa ferdon butu ætsomne to Affricalande, & þa forð gangendum þæs cyninges aðume, þe hire sunu hæfde, him ongæn gearn seo wydewe & hine ærest bæd, þæt he hire sunu alyfde.

Þæt þa se ælþeodiga wer, se þe wæs aþunden mid oferhigde & onblawen mid þy gefean þissere gewitendan gesælignysse, nalæs þæt an, þæt he forseah to donne, þæt heo hine bæd, ac eac forhogode hit gehyran.
Heo þa þæt wif hraðe cwæð æfter þan to him: geseoh, þæt ic þe sylle þysne man to gehwearfe for hine.
Gedo me þæt an to are, agif me minne agene sunu.
& þa þa he geseah þone biscop fægerne on ansyne, þa acsode man hine, hwylcne cræft he cuðe.
Him þa se drihtnes wer Paulinus andswarode & cwæð: ne can ic nænigne oþerne cræft buton þone, þæt ic mæg wyrta wel begangan.

Þæt þa se hæþena wer swiþe lustlice onfeng, þa þa he gehyrde, þæt he gelæred wæs wyrta to begangenne, & onfeng hine him to þeowan & agæf þære wydewan hire sunu, & sona swa heo hine hæfde, heo hire ham gewat fram Affricalande, & Paulinus onfeng þa nytte þæs wyrtgeardes.
& þa þa se ylca cyningces aðum gelomlice eode in þone wyrtgeard & sumra wyrta acsode þone his wyrtweard, þa gecneow he, þæt he wæs swiþe wis man.
& þa ongan he his freond & his geferan bebugan & gelomlice sprecan wiþ þone his wyrtweard & hine ongan wel his wyrta lystan.
Þam gewunode Paulinus dæghwamlice bringan to beode grene wyrta wel stincende & onfangenum hlafe eft hweorfan to þære gymingce his wyrtgeardes.

& þa þa he þis wel lange gedyde, þa sume dæge he spræc to his hlaforde & þus cwæð on dygolnysse: geseoh hwæt þu do & fela sceawa hu sceole geseted beon Wændlarice, forþon þe þes cyning under eallre hrædnesse swyltað.
Þa he þis gehyrde, he hit þam cyningce ne forhæl, forþon þe he synderlice wæs gelufod fram him, ac he him sæde, hwæt he gehyrde æt his þam wisan wyrtwearde.
Þa þa se cyning þis gehyrde, he sona cwæð: ic wolde geseon þisne man, þe þu me big sægst.

Him þa his aðum & Paulinus hwilena hlaford andswarode & cwæð: grene wyrta he is gewunod me to bringanne; þonne gedo ic, þæt he þa to ure mysan bringeð, þæt þu oncnawest, hwylc he is, se þe me þis sæde.
Þa wæs geworden, þæt se cyning sæt æt his mete.
Þyder com Paulinus & brohte of his weorce gehwylce grene & wel stincende wyrta.

Þa se cyning him færinga on beseah, eall he acwacode & cwæð to his hlaforde, þe him wæs þurh his dohtor on mægrædenne: soþ þæt is, þæt þu æt þysum men gehyrdest; & ic þe nu secge deogollice, þæt ic þe ær ne gesæde.

Witodlice nu toniht on swefne ic geseah rice deman on heahsetle sittan ongæn me, betwyh þam ic geseah þisne ylcan sittan, & þæt anweald mines rices, þe ic gefyrn onfeng, þurh heora dom hit me is of genumen.
Ac acsa þu, hwæt he sy; witodlice ne wene ic ne þysne wer swa mycelre geearnunge swa swiþe beon þissere worulde man, swa swa we wenað.
He þa þæs cyngces aþum cigde Paulinum on sundor & acsode, hwæt he wære.
Him þa se drihtnes wer andswarode & cwæð: ic eom þin þeowa, þone þu to gehwearfe name for þære wydewan sunu.
& þa hine georne bæd, þæt he sæde, hwæt he on his cyðþe wære, nalæs hwæt he þær wære, & þis he sohte æt him mid gelomlicre acsunge & halsunge.
He þa se Godes wer genyded mid mycclum halsungum ne mihte læng wiþsacan, hwæt he wæs, ac sæde him & cwæð: ic eom biscop.
Þa þa his hlaford þæt gehyrde, he him swiðe ondred & him eadmodlice bead & cwæð: bide swa hwæt swa þu wille, þæt þu mage to þinum lande mid mycelre gife eft hweorfan fram me.
Þa cwæð se drihtnes wer to him: an lufu is, þe þu miht me gegearwian: þæt þu forlæte to me ealle þa mæn, þe on minum biscoprice gehergode wæron.
& hi þa sona ealle wæron geacsode in Affricanalande & wæron gelætene for þære eadmodnysse þæs arwyrðan weres Paulines in his anweald.
& he þa het ealla heora scipu, þe hi on sceoldon feran, mid hwæte gehlæstan.
& þa æfter feawum dagum Wændla cyning forðferde, swa him se Godes þeowa Paulinus ær beforan sæde.
& þa wæs þæt swa geworden, þæt se Godes wer, þe hine ænne in Cristes bysene to sumre hwile in þeowdom sealde, þæt æfter fæce mid manigum gefreod eft ham gehwyrfde.
Petrus him andswarode: nu me gelamp, þæt ic þæt gehyrde, þæt ic æfterhyrgan ne mæg, & ma me lysteþ wepan þone sæcgan.

Gregorius him andswarode: be þæs ylcan Paulines forðfore is awriten, þæt he wæs gehrinen mid sidwærce & þurh þæt to his ænde gelæded, þæt eall his mynsterstede full fæste gestod, buton þam gebedhuse anum, in þam he læg seoc; gewordenre eorðstyrene eall hit abifode, & ealle, þe þær æt wæron, mid swyðlicum brogan astyrede.
& þa wæs alysed seo halige sawl of þam lichaman.
& þa wæs geworden, þæt mycclu fyrhtu geeode on ealle, þa þe Paulines ænde gesawon.
Nu þonne gif þu wille cume wit to þam utran wundrum, þara fela us syndon cuðe, & ic geleornode fore sægne æfæstra wera.

Hit gelamp in þam dagum Gotena rices, þa þa Iohannes se eadegosta wer & papa þissere Romaniscan byrig ferde to Iustine, þe þa wæs Rome hlaford, & he becom to Chorinthia þære cæstre, þa wæs him an hors þearf, þæt man him funde, þæt he mihte on sittan.

Þa þæt geacsode sum æþele man & brohte him his hors, on þam gewunode his wif for mycelre stilnesse on sittan, on þæt gerad, þonne him man oþer hislic hors findan mihte, þæt man þæs wifes hors ham asende.
& þa wæs geworden, þæt se foresprecena wer to þære gecwedstowe wegendum þam ylcan horse wæs gelæded; sona swa he oþer gemette, ham he asænde þæt, þe him gelæned wæs.
& þa þa þæt wif þæs foresædan weres æfter hire þeawe wolde on ridan, ac heo ne mihte, forþon æfter þam onsæte swa haliges biscopes hit wiðsoc, þæt hit wif bære.
Witodlice hit ongan blawan & gremetian ungemetlice & mid unablinnendlicra brogdettunge ealles lichaman meldian & yppan, þæt hit ne mihte wifman beran æfter þam leomum þæs biscopes.
Þa þa hire wer wislice þæt oncneow, he hit sona eft sænde to þam arwyrþan were & mid mycclum benum bæd, þæt he hit him sylfa hæfde, forþon he hit mid his onsetle him sylfum to æhte ær gehalgode.

Be þam ylcan Iohanne þis wundor gewunode beon sæd fram urum witum, þæt he in Constantinopolim þære byrig cumende to þam geate, þæt is genæmned Aurea Porta, him ongæn yrnnendum folca mænigum in eallra gesihðe biddendum anum blindum gesyhðe he sealde & mid ofer asetedre handa he aflymde þara eagena þeostru.

Naht mycelre tide æfter þon abædendre nyde Gotena þeode se æresta wer Agapitus þyssere halgan Rome cyrcan papa, þam ic gestihtiendum Gode nu þeowige, ferde þa to Iustiniane þæs bufannæmdan Iustinianes suna.
Him þa gyta ferendum sume dæge on Grecalande wæs to broht to lacnianne an man, se wæs dumb & healt, swa þæt he nauþær ne mihte ne word acweþan ne æfre of eorðan upp arisan.
& þa þa hine his magas wepende to him brohton, se drihtnes wer georne acsode, hwæþer hi hæfdon þone geleafan, þæt he mihte beon gehæled.
Hi him andwyrdon & cwædon, þæt hi fæstne hiht hæfden be his hæle in Godes mægne & sancte Petres aldorlicnesse.
He þa sona se arwyrþa wer onhylde hine to gebede & ongan mæssan singan & in þæs ælmihtigan Godes gesihþe geoffrode þa onsægdnysse.
& þa þa he þæt gedon hæfde, he eode fram þam weofode & þæs healtan handa genam ætstandendum folce & tolociendum & hine arærde on his agene fet & him on muþ sænde drihtnes lichaman.
Þa wæs seo tunge alysed to spræce, seo þe lange ær wæs dumb.
& hi ealle wundriende ongunnon wepan & heora mod wearð afyrhted, þa þa hi sceawodon & gesawon, hwæt Agapitus in drihtnes mægne & sancte Petres fultume gedon mihte.

Eac swylce hit gelamp on þa tide þæs ylcan ealdermannes, þa þa Datius wæs gefyrðrod mid trymnesse rihtes geleafan, se wæs biscop þære burge Mediolana, þa ongan he faran to Constantinopolim þære byrig, & he becom to Cozenthi þære mægðe.
Þa ongan he secan him swa rum hus, þæt he mihte mid his geferrædene eallum in gewician, & he þæt uneaðe findan mihte.
Þa geseah he feorran sum hus, þæt wæs gerisenlicre mycelnysse, & þa het he, þæt man þæt him gegearwode, þæt he mihte þa niht þær inne gewunian.
Þa sædon him þa landleode þære ylcan stowe, þæt he in þam huse beon ne mihte, forþon þe deofla þær manige in eardodon & hit forþon weste wunode.
Þa andswarode him se halga wer Datius se biscop þus cweþende: þæs þe lustlicor we sceolon þærinne eardian, nu se awyrgda gast to þon ferde in þæt hus, þæt he manna eardunge of þam huse adrife.
Þa bebead he, þæt hit him gegearwod beon sceolde, & orsorh he þærin eode, to þon þæt he wære ræfnende þa gewin þæs ealdan feondes.

Þa gelamp hit in þære nihte, þa þa seo mæsta stilnes & swigung wæs, & se Godes wer reste, þæt se ealda feond ongan onhyrgian mid unmætum stefnum & mid mycclum cleopungum leona grymetunge & hryðra gehlowe & eosola gehlyd & næddrena hwistlunge & swyna grununge & musa hwicunge.

Þa færinga wearð se halga wer Datius mid swa manigra wilddeora stefnum aweaht, & he þa swyþlice eorre aras & wið þam ealdan feonde ongan mid mycclum stefnum clypian & þus cweðan: wel is þe gelumpen, þu earma, þe iu cwæde: ic sette min heahsetl to norðdæle heofona rices, & ic beo þam hehstan Gode gelic.
Geseoh nu, þæt þu for þinum oferhigde eart geworden swynum & musum gelic, & þu, þe wære unwyrðe & hwæþre woldest þinne drihten onhyrgian, nu, swa swa þu wyrðe eart, þu onhyrest wilddeor.
& þa gehyredre þære his stemne, swa swa ic secge, for ðære onwegadrifennesse se awyrgda gast his sceamode, se þe onufan þæt ne eode na in þæt hus, þe he ær his scincræftas in gegearwode.
& swa æfter þon hit wæs geworden geleaffullra manna eardunghus, forþon þa þa þær wæs an geleaffull man soðsecgende in gangende, hraðe se leasa gast & se ungeleaffulla onweg gewat.
Ac nu gedafenað, þæt we sume hwile geswigian be þam ærran wyrdum & dædum, & us is to cumene to þam wundrum, þe on urum dagum gelumpon & gedone wæron.

Soðlice sume æfæste weras us wæron cuðe, þa wæron of dælum þæs boltgeteles, þe hatte Apaulie; þa us þis cyðdon, þæt mid manigra gewitnysse feorr & wide gemærsod wæs be Sabino, se wæs þære burge biscop, þe hatte Canusina.
Hi gewunedon us cyðan, þæt þes ylca wer lange his eagena gesihþe forlete, swa þæt he nanwiht geseon ne mihte.
Þa geacsode Gotena cyning, se wæs gehaten Totila, þæt se biscop hæfde witedomes gast; & he hwæþre þæt ne gelyfde, ac he wolde cunnian, hwæþer hit swa wære, swa swa he ær secgan gehyrde.

& þa þa se cyning becom on þæt land, þa gelaðode se drihtnes wer þysne cyning to underngeweorce; & þa þa se cyning to þære mysan becom, þa nolde he sittan on þa wynstran healfe, ac he gesæt on þa swiðran þæs arwyrðan biscopes Sauines.
Þa bær þæs biscopes cniht to his fæder wines drync, swa swa hit þeaw wæs.

Þa ræhte se cyning his hand forð swigende & genam þone hnæp æt þam cnihte & mid his handa for gewrixle þæs cnihtes he þam biscope þone drync sealde, to þon þæt he gesawe & ongeate, hwæþer se biscop wære geseondum & oncnawan mihte þurh Godes gast hwa þæt wære, þe him þone drync sealde.
Þa se Godes wer onfeng þam hnæppe & na ne geseah þone þegn, ac he hwæþre cwæð: lifige þeos hand in ecnysse, þe me þysne drync syleþ.
For þam worde se cyning wæs bliðe & þehhwæðer him sceamode, forþon þeah þe he fram þam Godes were ongyten wære, hwæþre he þæt mægn onfunde, þæt he þær sohte.
Soðlice þyses arwyrþan weres lif in langre ylde wæs getogen to bysne þara æfterfylgendra.
Þa wearð his diacon mid unrihtre gewilnunge onæled, & he þohte, þæt he þone biscop wolde mid attre acwellan.
Þa gebigde he þæs fylleres mod, to þon þæt he gemængde attor to ðæs wines drynce.
& þa æt þæs gereordes tide, þa se biscop to mete sæt, þa funde se his arcedeacon æt þam cnihte, þe wæs þæs biscopes byrele mid medum, þæt he þone geættredan drync him to bær.
Þa sona cwæð se arwyrða biscop to þam cnihte: drinc þu þis, þæt þu me berest to drincane.
Þa cwacode se cniht, forþon þe he ongæt, þæt he arasod wæs.
& ma he wolde þæs deaðes drync drincan, þonne he wolde þæt mennisce wite & scame ræfnian for þam gylte swa myceles morðes.
& þa se cniht dyde þone hnep to his muðe, þa styrde se drihtnes wer him þus cweþende: ne drync þu þis, ac syle me; ic hit drince.
& gang þu & sæge þam, þe þisne drync þe sealde, þæt ic drince þis attor, & he ne biþ hwæðre nænig bisceop.

& þa hrædlice gedonum Cristes rodetacne se biscop orsorhlice dranc þæt attor, & in þa ylcan tid se deacon wearþ forðfered on oðre stowe, þær he þa wæs, efne swa þa attru geondferdon þæs arcedeacnes innoþ þurh þæs biscopes muð.
Þam swa þeah wæs sona þæs lichamlican attres wana, þæt him þæt ænigne deað ongebrohte, ac he wearð acweald mid þy attre his agnes niþes in gesihþe þæs ecan deman.
Petrus cwæð: þas wisan syndon wundorlice, & on urum tidum hi syndon us swiðe to wafienne.
Ac hit sægd is, þæt þyses ylcan weres lif swylc wære, þæt se þe ongyteð his drohtað, ne scyle he wundrian his mægn.
Gregorius him andswarode: nelle ic eac þis forswigian, Petrus, þæt me gelomlice cyðdon þa, þe her nu syndon of Narnusnensi þære cæstre.
Witodlice on þa ylcan tid hit gelamp, þæt se foresprecena Gotena cyning Totila com to þære cæstre Narnus.
Þa ferde him ongæn se wer þæs arwyrðan lifes, þæs nama wæs Cassius, se wæs biscop þære ylcan burge.
& him wæs gecynde, þæt he symble wæs read on his andwlitan.
Þa ne gelyfde na se cyning Totila, þæt hit him for his gecynda wære, ac he wende, þæt hit for singalum gedrynce wære, & eallum gemetum he hine forseah & forhogode.

Ac se ælmihtiga God geeowde, hu myccles mægnes he wæs in Narnusnensi þam felda, þær se cyning to com, þa ferde se awyrgda gast in þæs cyninges swurdboran beforan eallum his folce & ongan hine wælgrimlice swencan.
& he þa wæs gelæded beforan þæs cyninges gesihþe to ðam arwyrðan were Cassio þam biscope.
Þa se biscop gefyldum his gebede & gedonum Cristes rodetacne adraf þone deofol ut of þam mæn, se ne geþristlæhte ofer þæt, þæt he eft in hine eode.
Swa þa wæs geworden, þæt se reþa cyning þam Godes þeowan arode of þam dæge & wurðode mid inweardre heortan, þone he ær demde swiþe forseowene for his ansyne.
Soðlice forþon þe he geseah, þæt se wer wæs myccles mægnes & geearnunga, þy syþþan þæt fullfremede mod geswyðrode ymbe hine fram þære heannesse þara oferhygda.
Ac nu, þa þa ic sæde þa wyrda haligra wera, færinga me becom to gemynde, hu seo godcunde mildheortnes gecyðde ymbe Andream þone biscop þære cæstre Fundene.

Þæt þonne hwæþre ic wysce & wilnige, þæt þa magon gehealdan, þe þis rædað, & þæt hi ne geneþon na, þæt hi geeardian mid wifum, þa þe gehalgiað & gehatað heora lichaman þære rihtan forhæfdnesse, þy læs hit gelimpe, þæt þam hreowsiendan mode swa myccle ma sio færlice scyndnes undercreope, swa mycle swa þam mode swyþur þeowað seo andweardnes þære lustbærlican onsyne & tyhtað to þon, þæt hit yfele & unrihtlice gelysteð.
Nis eac seo wise tweogendlicu, þe ic nu secge, forþon þe þær ful neah wæron swa manige men to gewitnesse, swa þær in þære stowe wunedon.

Witodlice þa þes arwyrða wer his lif gelædde mid manigfealdum mægnum wel gefylled & hine sylfne geheold on þære forhæfdnesse cræfte under þyllicum sacerdhade, þa wæs sum nunne mid him, þe he ær on his geferscipe hæfde.
Þa he nolde for his biscophade hi aweg adrifan, ac he geare wiste ge be his sylfes clænnesse ge eac be hire forhæfdnesse, þa let he hi mid him wunian.
Of þære wisan wæs gedon, þæt se ealda feond begeat sume costunge ingang in þam mode þæs halgan biscopes.
Cuðlice in his modes eagum he ongan hire fægernesse behealdan, & he wæs gelustfullod in unrihtum geþohte.
Þa sume dæge wæs sum Iudeisc man farende of Campianalande & to Rome cumende.
Þa þa he on þam siðe farende wæs, he becom to þære stowe, þe Appia hatte.
Þa geseah he, þæt se dæg wæs onhylded to æfenne, & he ne mihte findan, hwær he on niht gereste.
Þa wæs þær neah Apollines templ.
Þa gefealh he þærin & þær þa niht gewunode & him swiþe ondred þa feondgyld, þe þærinne wæron.
Þeah þe he næfde rihtne geleafan, hwæþere he hine mid Cristes rodetacne gesegnode.

& þa soðlice ymb middeniht he læg wæccende, þa wearð he mid mycelre fyrhte gedrefed, & þa færinga tolociende geseah he myccle mænigu awyrgdra gasta, þa wæron foregangende, swylce hi on þegnunge wæron sumes hlafordes.
& he þa geseah, þæt se þe heora yldost wæs, in sumum dæle þære stowe gesæt.
Þa ongan he acsian synderlice þara þegniendra gasta gehwylcne, hwæt he gedon hæfde, & he witan wolde, hu mycelne niþ hi hæfdon menniscum cynne æteowed.

& þa þara awyrgedra gasta gehwylc his acsunge synderlice gerehton, hwæt hi wið godum mannum yfles gedon hæfdon, þa stelde þær an forð in heora middle, se sæde mid hu mycelre costunge he onstyrede þone lichaman in þam mode Andreas þæs biscopes þurh þære nunnan fægernesse, þe on his geferscipe wunode.
Þa se awyrgda gast, þe þær yldost wæs, þis geornlice gehyrde, & he gelyfde, þæt hit him þe mare gestreon wære, gif he mihte þæs halgan mannes sawle to þam fylle ænige forspillednysse gebigan.
Þa gyt se ylca gast, se þe þas wisan anddette & ypte, he to geecte & þus cwæð: þæt ic him næfre nahte ne mihte ær þys ærran æfenne.
On æfentid ic geteah his mod to þon, þæt he lufode mid his bradre hand þa nunnan & ofer þa sculdru geþaccode.

Þa se awyrgda gast & se ealda feond þyses menniscan cynnes hine geornlice mid liðum wordum bæd & lærde, þæt he gefremede, þæt he ær ongan, to þon þæt he synderlice sigor hæfde betwyh þam oþrum hellegastum.

& þa se Iudeisca man, þe þær to com, wæccende þis sceawode, & for mycelre nearonesse fyrhto he cwacode, & fram ðam ylcan gaste beboden wæs, se þær wæs yldra þonne þa oðre, þe him þegnodon, þæt hi secan sceolden, hwylc se wære þe geþristlæhte to þon, þæt he in þam temple gelæge, þa ferdon þa awyrgdan gastas & geornlice hine beheoldon, & hi gesawon, þæt he wæs gemearcod mid þy halgan geryne Cristes rodetacnes.
Þa wæron hi wundriende & cwædon: walawa.
Þis is æmtig fæt & gesegnod.
Hi þa þis eft heora aldre sædon, & þa sona eall seo mænigu þara awyrgedra gasta onweg gewat.
& þa hraðe se Iudeisca man aras, þe þis eall geseah, & to þam biscope ferde & hine þa in his cyrican gemette & hine þa on sundor gecigde & frægn, mid hwylcere costunge he geþread wære.
Þa scamode þone biscop & nolde him þa his costunge geandettan.
Þa sæde se Iudeisce man him, þæt he beheolde þa nunnan & mid unrihtre his eagena lufe hi lufode.

Þa gyt se biscop wiðsoc, þa geecte se Iudeisca man hit þus cweþende: forhwon wiþsæcst þu þæs þe þu eart geacsod, þu þe gyrstan æfenne to þon gelæded wære, þæt þu mid þinre bradre hand þa nunnan ofer hire eaxle þaccodest?
& þa butan tweon eadmodlice he andette, þæt he ær fæstlice wiðsoc, forþon þe se biscop wæs behealdende, þæt he in his agnum wordum arasod wæs.
Þæs hryre & his scame þæs ylca Iudeisca man wæs afrefriende, & þa sæde he, hu he þis ongæt, & eac hwylce word he gehyrde be him sprecan in gemetinge þara awyrgedra gasta.
Þa se biscop þæt wæs ongytende, he þa hraðe hine sylfne on eorðan astrehte & in gebed sealde.
& he sona aweg adraf nalæs na þa nunnan ane, ac ealle þa wif, þe ær on his geferscipe wunedon.
& soðlice he gehalgode in þam Apollones temple gebedhus þæs eadigan apostoles sanctus Andreas, & he fæstlice ealle þa costunga of his agnum lichaman adrigde.
& soðlice þone Iudeiscan man he geteah to þære ecan hæle, þurh þæs gesihðe & þreaunge se biscop wearð gehæled.
Witodlice he gelædde hine to þam sceate þære halgan cyrican, & he hine gelærde mid þy halgan geryne rihtes geleafan, & he hine geclænsode mid þy wætere fullwihtes bæþes.

& swa hit wæs geworden, þæt se ylca Ebreisca man, þa þa he þam biscope þa fremdan hælo forgæf, þa becom he gesæliglice to his agenre hæle, & swa se ælmihtiga God þanon he eac þone oðerne to godum life gelædde, þanon he eac þone oþerne to godum life geheold.
Petrus cwæð: þeos gedone wise, þe ic nu gehyrde, heo me nu gegearwað gehwæþre ge mycelne ege ge mycelne hiht.
Gregorius him andswarode & cwæð: witodlice swa us gedafenað, þæt we symble ne getweogen of Godes gemiltsunge, & symble we magon forhtian for ure sylfra untrumnesse.
Geseoh nu, þæt neorxnawanges cedertreow wæs swyþe astyred, hwæþre næs hit upp alocen, to þon þæt us untrumum for þæs treowes styrenesse wære ege æteowed, & for his staþolfæstnysse bældo.
Eac swylce sum wer wæs swiðe arwyrþes lifes, þam wæs nama Constantius, se wæs þære burge biscop Aquina.
Se wæs niwan forðfered on þa tid mines foregengan, se wæs eadigre gemynde papa Iohannes.
Manige men cyþdon, þæt he hæfde witedomes gast, þa þe hine cuþlice cuðon.

Eac þæt secgað þa æfæstan & þa soðsagalan weras, þe him andwearda wæron, betwyh oþrum þingum, þæt hit gelumpe in þam dæge his forþfore, þa þe hine ymbstodon þa ceasterwara & heom swa leof fæder wæs leorende, þæs þe hit gecweden beon mæg, of þyssere worulde, & he þa swiðe biterlice wæs cwiþed fram þam ymbstandendum, & weopende hi hine acsodon þus cweðende: hwylcne fæder habbað we æfter þe?
Þa se fæder þurh witedomes gast him andswarode þus cweþende: æfter me Constantie fehð to min horsþegn, & æfter him Iobinus, se wæs min wæscestre.
Eala, þu burh, þu Equine, þæt þe þus gelimpeð.
& þa gecwedenum þyses witedomes wordum he his gast onsænde.
& him þa forðferdum Andreas, se þe ær wæs his deacon, he onfeng þære heordelican scire gymnysse, se wæs gefyrn þæs biscopes horsþegn Constanties.
& him þa of þysum life alæddum, Iobinus wæs hleotende þa ændebyrdnysse biscophades, se wæs ær wæscestre in þære ylcan cæstre.

& him þa gyt lifigendum swa þa eardiend þære ceastre wurdon forhergode ealle, & mid ælþeodigra manna sweordum & mid unmæte mancwealme hi wæron forslægene to þan swiðe, þæt æfter his dæge þær næs nænig þara gemeted, þe biscop beon mihte ne eac þa broðra behealdan mihte.
& swa wæs gefylled se cwyde þæs halgan weres, þæt æfter forðsiþe & æfter geleornesse þara twegra, þe æfter him wæron, syþþan seo cyrice nænigne heorde hæfde.
Eac ne forswigie ic na þis, þæt gelamp nu for twam gærum sæcgendum þam arwyrðan were Uenantie, se wæs þære cæstre biscop Lunan.
Witodlice he sæde, þæt in Lucan þære cæstre, seo þe him neh wæs, wære sum wer swiðe wundorlices mægnes, þæs nama wæs Fridianus, se wæs þære cæstre biscop.

Þæs wundra sum þæt mæreste wæs gecyðed fram eallum þam, þe þær eardodon, þæt seo ea, seo þe floweþ be þam burhwealle, forhergiende wære his land, & oft gedonre yþunge se stream mid his rynum & mid his uppgange gewunode, þæt he togoten wæs geond his æceras, & þa geplantedan wingeardes, þa þe he gemette, ealle he þa oferfleow.
& þa þa þis gelomlice gedon wæs, & mycclu neodþearf nydde þa landleode þære stowe, þæt hi þære ea sum furlang heora weorces gesealdan, þa ongunnon hi on oðre stowe geryman þa ea.
Ac þeah þe hi þær lange wuniende wæron, ne mihton hi hwæðre þone stream of his rihtryne abygan.
Þa worhte se drihtnes wer Frigdianus him ane lytle racan & eode to þære ea & þær ana hine on his gebed onhylde & þære ylcan ea bebead, þæt heo him fylgde þurh þa stowe, þe he on ferde.

Þa geteah he þa racan æfter þære eorðan, & þa forlætenum hire agnum streame eall seo ea wæs him fylgende, swa þæt heo eallunga þone gewunelican ryne anforlet & hire sylfre geahnode þone ryne, þe se drihtnes wer beforan mid þære racan ær tacnode on þære eorðan, & heo syþþan naht ne derede heora andlyfnum, þe þam mannum bryce wæron ne on gesawenre eorðe ne on gesettum wingearde.
Eac swylce ic oncneow oðer wundor þurh gesægene þæs arwyrðan biscopes Uenanties.

Se sæde, þæt hit gedon wære in þære byryg Placentsan, þæt se unleasesta wer Iohannes, se is nu gerefscire healdende in þyssere Romebyrig, se wæs eac geboren & gefeded in þære ylcan byrig Placentsan, he eac gecydde, þæt hit eallswa gedon wære, swa us se biscop ær sæde Uenantius.
Witodlice hi us sædon, þæt in þære ylcan cæstre wære sum biscop swyðe wundorlice myccles mægnes, þam wæs nama Sabinus.

Þam þa sume dæge his agen deacon sæde, þæt Pad seo ea wære of hire rihtryne on þære cyrican yrðland up yrnende, & þæt þæt wæter hire flodes ealle þa stowe fornumen hæfde, þe þær ðam mannum to bigleofa beon sceolde.
Þa andswarode se arwyrða biscop Sabinus þam deacone þus cweþende: ga & cweð to ðære ea: geblin ðu þyses flodes & cyrr to ðinum agenum rihtryne.
Þa se deacon þæt gehyrde, þa hloh he & hine forseah.

Þa se drihtnes wer him to gehet his writere & him dihtode þus cweðende: Sabinus se drihtnes þeowa þe het beodan þis gebod & þus cwæð: ic þe bebeode, Pad, on naman ures drihtnes hælendes Cristes, þæt þu ut ne gange of ðinum agnum ryne ofer ðis in þas stowe, ne þu na geþrystlæce, þæt þu ure cyricland on ænigum þinge derige.
& þa gyt to geecte þam ylcan writere þus cweþende: geseoh þu, þæt þu þis awrite & weorp in þæt wæter þæs ylcan flodes.
He þæt bebod onfeng þæs halgan weres & swa dyde, swa he him bebead.
Þa syððan gestilde se flod & gecyrde fram þan cyriclande to his agnum rihtryne & næfre syðþan þæt heo on ðam lande up urne.

In þære wisan, Petrus, hwæt oðres magon we ongytan, buton þæt þær wæs onscynded manna heortena heardnes & heora unhyrsumnes, þa þæt unandgytfulle gesceaft þæs wætres wæs hyrende þam halgan were in his mægne?
Þa wæs eac sum wer swiþe arwyrðes lifes, þæs nama wæs Cerbonius, se wæs þære burge biscop Populine.
Se us sealde in urum dagum þa cyðnesse his mycclan haligdomes.
Soðlice þa þa he wæs swyðe georne behealdende ða teolone his gestliðnesse, þa wæron þær sume dæge militisce men farende.
Þa onfeng he þa in his gesthuse & hi ahydde, forþon þe þær æfter com Gotiscra manna here.
& se Godes man geheold heora lif wið þara oðra nið.
& þæt þa wæs gesæd þam treowleasan Gotena cyningc Totillan.
Þa wearð he onæled mid unmættre wælhreownesse.
Þa het he þysne biscop beon gelæded to þære stowe, þe is gehaten Meroles, seo wæs VIII milum fram his byrig, þær he þa sæt mid his here.
& he het, þæt hine man wurpe berum to fretanne beforan gesihðe ealles þæs folces.

& þa þa se ylca treowleasa cyningc gesæt in ðære sceawunge, to ðon þæt he wolde geseon þæs biscopes deað, & þa wæs þær to cumen swyðe mycclu folca mænigu, þa wæs eac se biscop gelæded in þone middel þæs folces, & þær wæs begyten se mæsta & se ryþesta bera to his deaðe, se wæs gewunod, þæt he oft wælhreowlice manna lichaman slat.
& þa forlet man þone beran of his bendum.
Þa wæs he swiþe mid reðnesse onæled & þa hraðe þone biscop gesohte.
Ac þa færinga he forgæt ealle þa his reðnesse & his swyran onbigde & his heafod eadmodlice ofdune asænde & ongan liccian þæs biscopes fet.

Þa hit wæs þus gedon, þæt hit openlice mihte beon ongyten fram eallum mannum, þæt ymb þone Godes man þara manna heortan wæron gewended in wilddeora reðnesse, & þæs wilddeores heorte wæs gehwyrfed in mænnisce bilwytnysse.
Þa þæt folc, þe þær ær com to sceawunge þæs biscopes deaðes, mid mycelre cleopunge wearð gecyrred in wundrunge & in are.

Þa wæs eac se cyning sylf onwænded to begangenne þæs biscopes arwyrðnysse, & swa hit wæs gedon mid Godes dome, þæt se þe ær Gode fylgan nolde in gehælde þæs biscopes lifes, sona he eft him fylgde fram andweardnesse þæs wildan deores.
& nu gyt syndon manige men lifigende, þe þær þa andwearde wæron, þa us cyðdon, þæt hi mid eallum þam folce þæt sceawedon, & hi sylfe hit gesawon.
Eac swylce ic oncneow oðer wundor be ðam ylcan were, þæt me sæde Uenantius se biscop in Lunan.
Soðlice he het him gegearwian byrgenne in þære ylcan byrig Populine, þær wæs his biscopstol in þære cyrican.
Ac þa comon Langbeardisca leoda & þæt land eall hergedon.
Þa gewat se biscop to Elbam þam ealande, & þa onhreosendre mettrumnesse he genealæhte to deaðe.
Þa bebead he his preostum, þe æt his þegnunge wæron, þus cweðende: gesettað me on mine byrgene, þe ic me gegearwode.
Þa sædon hi to him: hu magon we þinne lichaman þider gelædan, nu we witon, þæt Langbearde habbað þa stowe genumen & æghwær þær ymbutan farað?
Þa andswarode se biscop heom & cwæð: gelædað me þider orsorhlice & ne ondrædað eow, ac ofstlice bebyrgað me, & sona swa min lichama bebyrged sy, beoð ge mid eallre hrædnesse eft þanon farende.
Þa forðferedum þam biscope hi asetton his lichaman on scip & ferdon to þære byrig Populine.
Þa wæs swyðe mycel genip geworden in þam wolcnum, & unmæte renas rindon.

Ac hit eallum mannum gecyðed wæs, þæt in þam dæle þæs sæs, þær þæt scip bær þæs halgan weres lichaman, & hi ferdon fram Elba þam ealande, þanon syndon XII mila to þære byrig Populine, & on ægðre healfe þæs scipes wæs swiþe mycel regnes storm, & in þæt ilce scip nan regnes dropa ne gefeoll.
Þa becomon þa preostas to þære stowe, & þæs biscopes lichaman hi þær bebyrgdon, & his bebodu hi geheoldon, & ofstlice hi wæron to heora scipe eft cyrrende.
Þa sona swa hi on heora scipe eft wæron, þa com se wælhreowesta Langbeardena ealdorman in þa ylcan stowe, þær se drihtnes wer inne bebyrged wæs.
Of ðæs tocyme him wæs gecyðed, þæt se Godes wer hæfde witedomes gast, forþon þe he bebead his þegnum, þæt hi hrædlice of þære stowe his byrgene aweg gewitan.
Soðlice þis wundor þæs regnes gedales, þe þær geworden wæs, hit is us getacnod to secgenne be sumes biscopes arwyrðnesse.
Soþlice sum eald preost is nu gyt lifigende, se us cyðde, þæt he sylf þær andweard wære, þus cweðende: Fulgentius wæs haten þære cyrican & þære biscopscire biscop, seo genemned is Utricolensis.
Se hæfde swiðe abelged þone wælhreowan cyning Totila, þa þa he mid herge to þære stowe genealæhte.
Þa gewilnode se biscop, þæt he wið his preostas hwylcehugu lac þider sænde & þæs cyninges hatheortnesse gestildan, gif hi mihton.
Sona swa se cyningc þa lac geseah, he forhogode hi & swyðe eorre bebead his mannum, þæt hi þone ylcan biscop mid mycelre hrædnesse gebundon & hine to his dome geheoldon.

Þa þa reðan þegnas þæs Gotan genamon hine for þæs cyningces wælhreownysse & þa ymbhæfdon hine utan & bebudon, þæt he stode in anre stowe & ymb hine gemearcodon anne hring on þære eorðan & heton, þæt he nænige þinga mid his fet þone hring ne oferstope.
& þa þa se Godes wer wæs þær ymbstanden fram þam ylcan Gotum, he barn in þære hæto þære swyþlican sunnan & wæs belocen binnan þam mearce þæs hringes.
Þa semninga gewurdon ligetslehtas & þunorada, & swa mycel regnes mægn com, þæt þa þe in þone biscop fengon to healdanne, þæt hi ne mihton adreogan þa mycelnesse þæs regnes.
& of eallan þam gewyderu, ne gefeoll an dropa þæs regnes binnan þone mearcon þæs hringces, in þam stod se Godes wer Fulgentius.

Mid þy þe þæt þus geworden wæs bodod þam wælhreowestan cyninge, þa sona wæs his þæt reðe mod gecyrred to mycelre arwurðnesse þæs biscopes, þæs ylcan þe hine ær lyste wites & yflunge for his þære ungefylledlican hatheortnesse.

Swa se ælmihtiga God wyrcað þa wundru his mihte þurh his gecorene, þa beoþ mannum gesewene, ongæn þa oferhydigan mod lichamlicra manna, & seo soðfæstnes forseteþ heora sweoran & gebigeð þurh þa eadmodan men, forþon þe heo hi symble ahebbað oferhigdilice ongen þa bebodu þære soðfæstnesse.
Eac hit gelamp nu niwan, þæt Floridus þæs arwyrðan lifes biscop me sæde sum swiðe wundorlic wundor.

He cwæð, þæt se halga wer Erculanus min fosterfæder, se wæs biscop Purusine þære cæstre, þæt he wære gelæded of þæs mynstres drohtoðe to þæs sacerdlican hades gife, & þæt wæs in Totillan dagum þæs treowleasan cyningces.
Þa ylcan buruh ymbsæt þara Gotena here singallice VII gær.
Þa of þære byrig manige þara ceasterwarena flugon, þa þe ne mihton adreogan þæs hungres fræcnesse.
& þa on þan seofoðan gære na þa gyt eallunga geendedum se here þara Gotena geeode in ða ymbsetenan burh.
Þa sende se ealdorman, se þe in þam herge yldost wæs, his ærendwrecan to ðam cyninge Totillan his hlaforde & acsode, hwæt he don sceolde þam biscope oððe þam folce.
& he him þa bebead & cwæð: befleh ærest ænne þwang þam biscope fram þam hneccan oþ þone hoh & him þæt heafod syþþan of aceorf & syððan eall þæt folc, þe þu þær finde, sleh mid sweorde.

He þa se ylca ealdorman het gelædan þone arwyrþan biscop & þone halgan wer Erculanum ofer þære burge weall & hine þær heafde beceorfan & him het of deadum aflean þone þwang fram þam hneccan oþ þone hoh.
& syððan he awearp þæt lic ut buton þone weall.
Þa sume men mid menniscre arfæstnysse gesetton þæt heafod eft to þe sweoran & bebyrigdon þæs biscopes lic be ðam wealle & an lytel cild mid him, þæt þær ær funden wæs eac ofslagen.

Þa þe feowertigoðan dæge æfter þam ilcan slehte gelyfde se ylca cyning, þæt þære burge ceasterware, þe ær gehwider todrifene wæron, to þære ylcan byrig eft gecyrdon buton ælcere fyrhto, & eft hi wæron cyrrende onfangenre leafe to lifigenne, þa þe ær flugon ægþer ge þone hungor ge eac þone sleht.

Þa wæron gemyndige þa buruhwaran, hwylces lifes se heora biscop wæs, & þa geornlice sohton, hwær his lichama bebyrged wære, þæt hi þone mid gerisenlicre are bebyrgdon in þære cyrcan þæs eadigan apostoles sancte Petres.

& þa þe to ðære byrgene geeodon, þa dulfon hi in þa eorðan & gemetton þone lichaman þæs cildes, þe þær samod mid him bebyrged wæs, mid molsne gebrosnode & wyrma fulle, swa hit wen wæs ymb feowertig nihta, & soðlice hi gemetton þone lichaman þæs halgan biscopes swa andsundne, swylce he þy ylcan dæge bebyrged wære.

& eac þæt nu gyt is to arianne mid maran wundrunge, þæt swa fæste his heafod wæs gegrowen to ðam lichaman, swylce hit næfre of acorfen nære, & swa witodlice, þæt þær ne ætewde nænigne swaþe þæs snides.
& þa oncyrdon hi þæs lichaman þone hricg upp & sohton, hweþer hi findan mihton ænig tacen þæs aflægenan þwanges.
& þa wæs gemeted eall seo lichama swa gesund & swa ungeonbyrded, swylce him næfre ne gehrine æniges irenes snide.
Petrus cwæð: hwylc man ne awundrað swylce wundru þara deadra, þa beoð gedone fore awæcenesse & lare þara lifigendra?
Gregorius andswarode: eac swylce on þam ærran Gotena tidum wæs sum swiþe arwyrðes lifes wer neh Spolitane þære byrig, þæs weres nama wæs Isac.
Se lifde fulneah oþ þa utemestan Gotena tidum.
Þone cuþon manige urra cuðra freonda & eallra gearost seo halige fæmne, þære nama wæs Gregoria, seo nu eardað in þyssere Romanebyrig be þære cyrican þære eadigan & þære clænan fæmnan sancte Marian.
Seo foresprecene fæmne Gregoria, þa þa heo in þa tid hire geogoðhades befleah þam gesettan gyfte to Godes cyrican, in þam hi man gifan wolde, haliges nunlifes drohtoþ heo sohte & wilnode.

& fram þam ylcan Godes were gescylded & gefreoðod fram þam gyftum heo wæs gelæded gifendum drihtne & scyldendum to ðam munuchade, þe heo wilnode & gyrnde, & þa forþon þe heo fleah, þæt heo hæfde ceorl on eorðan, heo geearnode habban brydguman on heofonum.
Witodlice fela ic ongæt be þysum ylcan were sæcgendum þam arwyrðan fæder Eleutherio, se þisne hiwcuðlice cuþe, & his lif gedyde & gegearwode, þæt man his wordum gelyfde.
Witodlice þes arwyrða Isac næs he na geboren in Langbeardum, ac hwæþre ic secge his wundor, þa þe he in Langbeardum lifigende worhte.

Þa þa he ærest com to Spolitanebyrig of Syria dælum his agnum earde, he abæd him ingang fram þam cyricweardum, þæt him wære agifen leaf him to gebiddenne swa lange swa he wolde, & þæt hi hine na ne nyddon, þæt he on deogle tid of ðære cyrican ut aeode.
He stod in his gebede ealne dæg & þam dæge þa æfterfylgendan nihte he to geþeodde.
Eac swylce þone æftran dæg mid his nihte unwerig on benum he þurhstod.
Cuðlice in his gebede þone þriddan dæg he þær to geþeodde.
& þa þa þis an þara cyricwearda geseah, mid oferhigde gaste inblawen þonon he becom to þam dæmme his sylfes wanunge, þonon þe he forð þeon sceolde þurh þæs oðres þeawes & bysene.
Witodlice he ongan þisne licetere næmnian & mid ceorliscum worde hine cigan æswica, forþon þe he eowde hine sylfne beforan manna eagum III dagas & III niht on gebede standan.
& þa sona eorrende sloh þone Godes wer mid his bradre hand ofer his wange, þæt he mid oretlan gebysmrod ut eode of þære cyrican, swa swa he wære licetere þæs æfæstan lifes.
Ac þisne þa sona færinga in geeode seo wræcenda gast & hine astrehte & afylde to þæs Godes weres fotum.
& þa ongan se deofol beforan eallum ðam, þe in ðære cyrican wæron, þurh ðæs gewitleasan cyricweardes muð clypian & cweþan: Isac me ut drifeð.
Witodlice nyste man ær, hwylcum naman se ælþeodiga man genemned wæs, ær þon se awyrgda gast, se þe of þam ylcan cyricwearde ut wæs adrifen, his naman acleopode & ameldode.
He þa sona se Godes wer gebeah ofer þone lichaman þæs geswenctan mannes, & þa aweg gewat se awyrgda gast, se þe hine ær in geeode.
Sona þæt wæs cuð geond ealle þa burh, hwæt þær in ðære cyrcan geworden wæs.
Þyder þa samod ongunnon yrnan weras & wif, æþele & unæþele, & hine heapmælum ongunnon to hyra husum laðian & lædan.
Sume hi woldon sellan heora sundorland mynster on to getimbrianne, sume heora feoh him to andlyfne, sume hi woldon eadmodlice bryngan þam Godes were eall swa hwæt swa hi mihton.
Ac se þeowa þæs ælmihtigan Godes þæs naht ne onfeng, ac ut gangende of þære byrig naht feor þanon funde him ane weste stowe, in þære he him sylfum geworhte tela mycele eardunghus.
To þam halgan men þa þe ferdon manige him ongunnon beon inæled mid þy wyllan þæs ecan lifes þurh his bysene, & agyfen hi sylfe in ðone ðeowdom þæs ælmihtigan drihtnes under his lareowdom.

& þa þa him gelomlice & eadmodlice ætfeolan his þegnas & lærdon hine, þæt he for his mynstres þearfe onfenge þæt yrfe, þæt him broht wæs, & he þa se wara weard his agenre þearfednesse heold him togenes strangne & rihtne munuclifes dom & cwæð: se munuc, se þe on þysum life wilnað, þæt he yrfe habbe, ne byð se beforan Gode munuc.
& swa se halga man forhtode, þæt he forlure þa gymelæste his þearfednesse, swa þa welegan & þa gitseras gewuniað healdan heora weorðendan welan, þæt hi þa ne forleosan.
& þæt þær feorr & wide eardiendum his lif wearð þearle cuþ ægþer ge mid mycclum wundra weorcum ge eac mid witedomes gaste.

Witodlice sume dæge on æfenne he het weorpan iserne geloman in þæs mynstres wyrtgeard, þa iserngeloman gewunelice naman we hataþ spadan & spitelas, & cwæð to his þegnum: weorpað in ðone wyrtgeard þus manige spada & eow hraðe gangað onweg.
Soþlice þære ylcan niht, þa þa he aras æfter his gewunan mid his gebroþrum drihtne lof to secganne, æfter þon he bebead & cwæð: gað nu & geseoðað ura wyrtena sufl, þæt hit sy on ærnemergen gearu.

& þa gewordenum ærmergenne he het beran mid him þone suflmete, þe he ær het gegearwian, & þa in eode mid þam broðrum in ðone wyrtgeard & þær gemette swa manige wyrcende wyrhtan in ðone wyrtgearde, swa manige swa he ær het spadena þærin weorpan.

Soþlice þær wæron in gangende þeofas in þone wyrtgeard; ac þurh Godes gast onwendum heora mode fram þære þyfþe hi onfengon þa þa spada & fram þære tide, þe hi þider in eodon, hi adulfon gehwylcne dæl þæs wyrtgeardes, þæs þe þær ær undolfen wæs.
Be þam se drihtnes wer, þa he to heom in eode, he cwæð: on sælum, la broðru, on sælum.
Hwæt.
Ge wel habbað geworht & gewunnen.
Blinnað nu sume hwile.
& heom þa sona het syllan þa andlyfne, þe he ær brohte, & hi gereorde æfter þam geswince swa myccles gewinnes.

& þa þa hi genoh fulle wæron, he cwæð to heom: ne willað ge nu leng þeofian ne yfel don, ac swa oft swa ge hwæt willað of þysum wyrtgearde habban, gað þonne to þæs wyrtgeardes geate & mid gedæftum biddað & mid bletsunge nimaþ & geswicað fram ðam þweoran þære þyfðe.
& þa het he heora æghwylcum gesomnian his byrþene wyrta.

& þa wæs swa geworden, þæt þa þe þider comon to þam wyrtgearde, to þon þæt hi þær hwæthugu forstælon, þæt hi æfter þon cyrdon buton þeofte mid ðære mede heora gewinnes mid bletsunge & mid gyfum gefylgde.
Eac swylce on sume tide to him genealæhton sume ælþeodige men & his mildheortnesse bædon oferhangene mid toslitenum claðum, swa þæt hi wæron fulneah nacode gesewene.

& þa þa hi hine hrægles bædon, swigende gehyrde heora word se drihtnes wer, & he ænne of his þegnum deogollice to him gecigde & him bebead & cwæð: gang & sec in þære stowe, þe ic þe secge, an hol treow & bring me þa hrægl, þe þu þærinne finde.

& þa þa se þegn eode & þæt treow sohte & funde, swa swa him beboden wæs, & þæt hrægl deogollice brohte to þam lareowe, þæt þa se drihtnes wer þam ælþeodigan & þam nacodan endum mannum eowde & cwæð: cumað nu & nimað þis hrægl & scrydað eow mid, forðon þe ge nacode syndon.
Þa hi þas hrægl gesawon, hi gecneowon, þæt hi hi ær gehyddon, & wurdon afærede mid mycelre scame, & scamiende hi onfengon heora agenu hrægl, þa þe hi mid facne fræmde sohton.

Hit gelamp eac on oþre tid, þæt sum man wæs hine sylfne befæstende to his gebedum & him onsænde be his cnihtum twa spyrtan fulle metes, þara oðre se cniht wiðbræd & on ðam wege ahydde, & þa oðre brohte to ðam Godes men & his hlafordes bene him sægde, se hine sylfne þam halgan men in his gebede þurh þas lac befæste.

& he þa se Godes wer þa ane þancfullice onfeng & þone ylcan cniht lærde & cwæð: þis me is on þance, ac beheald þu, þæt þu þære oðre ne onhrine, þe þu be þam wege ahyddest, forþon þe an næddre þær wæs in gangende.
Beo þu forþon wær, þæt þu ne sy geslægen fram þære nædran, gif þu þa spyrtan unwærlice nyman wylle.
For ðam wordum þa se cniht swiðe scamiende wæs gefeonde, þæt he þone deað geþigde, ac he þehhwæðre wæs geunrotsod, þeah þe he aræfnede halwendlic wite, hwæþre he bær his agene scame.
& þa wæs eft cyrrende to þære spyrtan & wærlice hawode & geseah, þæt seo nædre þærin wæs, swa swa se Godes wer him ær sæde.

Witodlice þa þa se Godes man unwiðmetedlice wæs geweorðod mid forhæfdnesse mægne & forhogunge woruldæhta mid witedomes gaste & gebedes geornesse, an þing wæs, þæt gesewen wæs on him tælwyrðe beon, þæt full oft swa mycclu blis in him wæs gesægenu beon, þæt he nane þinga næs gelyfed beon gefylled mid swa manigum mægnum swa he wæs, nymðe hine man þe gearwor cuðe.
Petrus cwæð: hwæt.

Ic la acsie þe, hwæt cweþe wit þis beon, þe he his sylfes wyllan geleoðode in him sylfum þære blisse geweald, hwæþer þe his mod wære hwylum getogen & genyded to þysum andweardan gefean, þeh þe him laðre wære, þa he swa manigra mægna full wæs?

Gregorius him andswarode & cwæð: mycel is seo gestihtung þæs ælmihtigan Godes, & full oft hit gelimpeð, þæt he hwilum ne syleð þa læssan dæde sume, þam þe he maran wundru gegearwað, þæt symble heora mod hæfde hwæthugu þæs þe hit mihte hit sylf symble big getælan, þæt hi, þonne hi gewilniað fullfremede beon & þonne ne magon, hi winnan in þan, þe hi na ne onfengon, & hwæðre ne ahebban na hi sylfe in oferhigde in þam wundrum, þe hi habbað heom on gewealde, þeah þe hy æfter þam læssan winnan.
Ac þis byð gedon, to ðon þæt hi leornian, þæt hi nabbað of heom sylfum þa maran wundru, þa þe in him sylfum ne magon oferswiðan þa lytlan & þa ytemestan uncyste.

Þanon wæs geworden, þæt ure drihten længest geheold Philisteas & Chananeas adwæscende ealle þa strangan & þa hwatestan þara wiðerbrecene gelæddum his folce to þam behatlande, þæt þæt, swa swa hit awriten is, Israhela folc byþ acunnod on rihtne dom in ðam twam cynnum.

Forþon þe full swiðe oft, swa swa hit gecweden wæs, eac swylce he lyfeð sumum mannum sume tælwyrðe wisan, þam þe he ær sealde þa mycclan gife, þæt hi symble habban hwæthugu þæs þe hi magon wið winnan & feohtan. & hi hyra mod upp ne aræran & ne gylpan þæs þe hi habban, þeah þe hi habban heora feond in þam mycclum dædum oferswiðede, forþon þe hi in þam læssan dædum þonne gyta beoð geswæncte fram heora wiðerbrocum.

& swa hit geweorðeð wundorlicum gemete, þæt an & þæt ilce mod ægþer ge mid healicum mægnum weaxeð & strangað & eac of his agenre untrymnysse wergað & teorað, to þon þæt hit geseo hit sylf beon on oþre healfe fæstlice getimbrod & on oþre tyderlice toworpen, to ðon þæt hit eadmodlice & fæste healde þæt god, þæt hit hafaþ, þonne hit habban ne mæg þæt, þæt hit seceð & georneð.

Ac hwylc wundor is, þeah þe we þis be mannum secgan, nu seo uplice leodræden þære ængellican gecynde of sumum dæle æfwerdlan & wonunge aræfnede of hyra efenceasterwarum & on sumum dæle fæstlice gestod & gewunode, swa þæt þa gecorenan engla gastas selfe swa myccle strenglicor & fæstlicor gestodon, swa myccle swa hi eadmodran wæron, þurh oferhigde þa oðre ofdune afeollon?
Soðlice hi forð fremedon & þungon þurh þa wununge heora geferscipes, & of ðam dæle heora toworpnysse & gedales to ecnesse staðole þy staðolfæstlicor hi wæron getrymede.
Þus hit byð gedon in anlepra gehwylcre sawle, þæt heo byð full oft to þam mæstan gestreonum gehealdenu of þam lytlan woningum in þa heardnesse & wearde heora sylfra eadmodnesse.
Petrus cwæð: wel me licað þæt þu cwyst.

Gregorius cwæð: þis ic eac ne forswigie, þæt þæt ic gecneow of þam ylcan lande þurh þa sægene þæs arwyrðan weres & mæssepreostes, þam wæs nama Sanctulus; be þæs wordum þu naht ne tweost, forðon þe þu geare canst his lif & geleafan.
Eac swylce in ða ylcan tid eardodon II weras on ðam dælum Nursige þære mægðe in life & in hade haliges drohtoðes, þara wæs oþer gehaten Euticius, oþer wæs genemned Florentius.
Ac se ylca Euticius aweox & gestrangode in gastlicum elne & in þam wylme godcundra mægna & ageornde, þæt he manigra manna sawla þurh þa trymnesse godcundre lare gelædde to drihtne.
Soðlice Florentius he helde þæt lif in bilwitnesse & in halgum gebedum.
Witodlice þær wæs mynster unfeorr fram heora huse, þæt wæs forlæten & hyrdeleas for heora hlafordes deaðe & forþfore of þam mynstre.
Þa woldon þa munecas habban heom to hlaforde þone ylcan Euticium.

He wæs sona geþafiende heora bene & hi underfeng & manega gær heold þæt mynstre & wel beeode & geteah þara muneca mod in þa geornesse haliges lifes & drohtoðes & let wunian þone arwyrðan wer Florentium in þam gebedhuse, þe he ær in eardode, þy læs hit æmtig stode.
In þam þa Florentius ana eardode, sume dæge he astrehte hine sylfne in gebed & bæd fram þam ælmihtigan drihtne, þæt he wære gemedemod him forgyfan & sellan hwylcehugu frofre þær to eardianne.
& sona swa he þæt gebed gefylde, he eode ut of þam gebedhuse & gemette ænne beran standan beforan þam durum.
He ofdune onhylde his heafod to þære eorðan & nawiht eowode his reðnesse on his gebærum, þæt hit openlice wæs ongyten, þæt he þyder com to þegnunge þæs Godes weres.
Þæt þa se drihtnes wer sona oncneow, forþon þær to lafe wunedon feower scep oððe V æt his cytan, & þa nyste he, hwa hi heolde.
He þa bebead þam ylcan beran & cwæð: gang & drif þa sceap in heora læse & cum eft to middes dæges ham.
Þa witodlice ongan þis unablinnendlice beon gedon, þæt is þonne se heordelice gyming, seo ðe to þam beran wæs beþancenu.
& hyt þa þæt wilde deor swa fæstende fedde & heold þa sceap, þe hit ær gewunode etan.
& þonne se drihtnes wer to nones wolde fæstan, þonne bebead he þam beran, þæt he ham hwurfe mid þam sceapum to þære nontide, & þonne he fæstan nolde, þæt he þonne come to middes dæges.
& swa ða in eallum þam wisum se bere hyrde þam bebode þæs Godes weres, þæt he no to middes dæges ham com, þonne him wæs beboden, þæt he to nones sceolde ham cuman.
& þa þa þis wæs lange swa gedon, þa ongan in þære ylcan stowe se hlisa swa myccles mægenes feor & wide beon gemærsad.

Ac forþon þe se ealda feond þonne getihð to wite & to yfle þa forhwyrfdan mæn þurh andan & æfæste, þonne þe he sceawaþ þa godan fremian & weaxan to Godes wuldre, þa ongunnon feower of þam þegnum þæs arwyrðan Euticius swiðlice æfæstigan, þæt heora hlaford nænig wunder ne worhte, & þes, se þe ana wæs forlæten, fore swa mycclum wundre wearð widmære.
& þa hatiende hi ofslogon þone ylcan beran.

& þa þa he ham ne com in ða tid, þe him bebead, se Godes wer Florentius þa wende his hamcymes & his abad oþ æfentid, & þa ongan he beon sarig, forþon þe se bera ham ne com, þone he gewunode for bilwitnesse broðor cigan.

He þa sona oðre dæge ferde ut geond þæt land samod secende þone beran & þa sceap, & þa funde he þone beran ofslægene & geornlice ongan acsian & eac hraðe geacsode, fram hwam he ofslagen wæs, & sealde hine sylfne in wop & in cwiðnesse & ma weop þara broðra nið, þonne þæs beran deað.

Þone þa se arwyrða wer Euticius to him gelaðode & hine ongan frefrian; ac se ylca drihtnes wer Florentius beforan þam broþrum mid þære uneþnysse swa myccles sares onæled biddende cwæð: ic gehyhte on þone ælmihtigan God, þæt hi in þysum life beforan eallra manna eagum heora niðes sume wrace onfon, forþon þe hy minne beran ofslogon unscyldigne, se þe heom nane dere ne dyde.
& sona seo godcunde wracu wæs fylgende his muðes stefne.
Witodlice þa IIII munecas, þe þone ylcan beran ofslogon, sona wurdon þurhslægene mid þære adle þæs mycclan lices, swa þæt afuliendum lichaman hi mid ealle forwurdon.

Þa se Godes wer Florentius swyðlice forhtode & him ondred, forþon þe he þa broðra swa swiðe wyrgde, & þa forþon weop þa hwile þe he lifde, forþon þe he swa hraþe gehyred wæs in ðære bene, & sæde, þæt he heora deaðes myrðra wære.
We gelyfað, þæt se ælmihtiga God þæt forþon dyde, þy læs se halga wer swa wundorlice bilwitnesse geþristlæhte ofer þæt ænigne man wyrgan, þeh þe he mid hwylcum sare gegremed & abolgen wære.
Petrus cwæð: cwyst þu la, gelyfað we gewislice þæt beon hefige synne & myccle, gif we hwylcum men wyrgað mid yrre onstyrede?
Gregorius cwæð: to hwan acsast þu me be þyssere synne, hwæðer heo hefig sy?
Gemyne, hwæt sanctus Paulus cwæð: wyrigcwidole men ne magon hi sittan on Godes rice.
Gehyge nu, hu mycel seo syn sy, seo þone man asyndrað fram Godes rice.
Petrus cwæð: ac hu byð þæt gif hit gelimpeþ, þæt se man þæt wyrignesse word ne gecwið to his þam nehstan for hete & niþe, ac hit sceoteð forð þurh his tungan gymeleasnesse?

Gregorius him andswarode: gehyr þis, Petrus: nu mid þam þearlwisan deman þæt unnytte word byð getæled, þeah þe hit butan niðe gecweden sy, & swa myccle ma þæt scyldige word byð gewitnod, gif hit mid feondscipe byþ gesprecen?
Ac geþenc forþon: nu þæt word byð wites wyrðe, þe butan niðe byþ, hu swiðe fordemedlic þæt byþ, þe ne byð butan hete & niðe gesprecen.
Petrus cwæð: ic hit geþence & wel gelyfe.
Gregorius þa gyt spræc: se ylca Godes wer dyde þa gyt oðer wundor, þæt ne sceall beon forswigod.
Soðlice þa þa his se myccla hlysa weox & mærsode feor & wide, sum deacon wæs feor þanon hamfæst, se gewilnode feran to him, þæt he hine sylfne mid his gebedum befæste.

& þa þa he com to ðæs halgan mannes cytan, he gemette ealle þa stowe fulle unarimedra nædrena in þam ingange þære cytan, & mid þy þe se diacon swyðe aforhtode & cleopode þus & cwæð: gebide þe la, drihtnes þeowa, gebide.
& hit wæs þa wundorlic smyltnes þære lyfte, & he þa Florentius ut eode & ahof his eagan up to heofonum & his folme aðenede & wilnode, þæt drihten him þone wol fram afyrsode.
Þa semninga for ðæs halgan weres stefne ahleoðrede se heofon, & seo þunorad ofsloh ealle þa nædran, þe þa stowe abysgodon.
& þa þa se drihtnes wer geseah þa nædran ofslagene, he cwæð: drihten, geseoh, þæt þu acwealdest þas nædran, ac hwa ahefeþ hi heonon?
& sona swa þæt gecweden wæs, þær comon swa manige fugelas, swa þara ofslagenra nædra wæron.
& hi þa onweg abæron æghwylce & swiðe feor awurpon & gedydon full clæne þara nædrena þa eardungstowe þæs halgan mannes.
Petrus cwæð: hwæt cweðað we, hwylces mægnes & hwylcre geearnunge þæt wære, þæt symble his muðe wæs swa swiðe neah se ælmihtiga God?
Gregorius him andswarode: swyðe þyhð la, Petrus, seo clænnes, & fremað seo bilwitnes þære mænniscan heortan mid þæs ælmihtigan Godes þære synderlican clænnesse & his þære bilwitan gecynde.

Witodlice þæt ilce, þæt his þeowas ne sprecaþ þa idlan word, þæt is þy þe hi beoð asceadene fram eorðlicum dædum, & bewarniaþ hi, þæt hi hira mod ne besmitað oþþe þurh unnyt word tostredan, & þonne forðon hi begytað beforan oþrum mannum, þæt hi beoð gehyred fram drihtne heora ordfruman & geþwæriað to þam swiðe eaðelice, swa swa of sumre gelicnesse þære clænnesse & bilwitnesse heora geþohtes.

Þonne we, þe wæron gemængde to þysum folclicum mængungum, gelomlice we sprecaþ þa unnyttan word & eac full oft þa, þe hefiglice beoþ scyldige, forðon ure muð þam ælmihtigan Gode byð þonne swa swiþe feor, swa swiðe swa he neah biþ þysum middangearde.

Witodlice we beoð swyðe feor ofdune gelæded þonne we gemengde beoð to þysum woroldmannum mid ure gelomlican spræce forþon þe þæt swyþe earfoðlic ðam mæn byþ, þæt seo tunge, þe sprecaþ ymb þa woruldþing, ne besmite þæt mod, þe heo gehrineð, & þonne eac ful oft we gewuniað, þæt we þam woruldmannum hwæthugu mid sprecað for gehlæge, & þa ylcan spræce we nimað lustlice, þeah þe heo si us unwyrðelice & unrihtlic to sprecane, & eac, þeah þe us na ne lyste to þære gecyrran, we becumað to ðære for gewille þara woruldhada.

& swa þonne geweorðeð, þæt we becumað þonne fram þam idlan wordum to þam sceaðfullum & fram þam leohtum wordum to þam hefigrim, & ure muð byþ þanne fram þam ælmihtigan Gode swa myccle læs gehyred in ure bene, swa mycle swa he ma besmiten byð mid þy dysilicran spræce.
Be þon hit is awriten: se þe onweg acyrreð his eare, þæt he ne gehyre þa Godes æ, þæs ben byð onscuniendlic mid Gode.
Hwylc wundor is þæt forðon, þeh þe we biddende syn late fram drihtne gehyrede, þe drihtnes bebod oððe late oþþe na gehyran wyllað?
Ac hwilc wundor is þæt forþon, þeah þe Florentius in his bene swa hraðe gehyred wære, se þe symble swyþe hrædlice drihten gehyrde in his bebodum?
Petrus cwæð: nis naht ma, þæt mæge geandswarian openlice þam rihte, þe þu recest.
Gregorius þa gyt sæde þus cweðende: Euticius wæs in Godes wege gefera þæs forecwedenan Florentius, se wearð swiþur mære æfter his deaðe in þam mægne his wundra.

Soðlice þa ceasterwara þære burge gewunedon, þæt hi fela wundra be him sædon, & þæt wæs eallra mæst þær getacnod genehhelice, þæt se ælmihtiga God worhte þurh his gegyrelan oð þas gewintide Langbeardna.

Soðlice swa oft swa regnes wæs wana, & seo lange drugung mid mycelre hæte bærnde þa eorðan, þanne gesamnodon þa ceasterwara þære burge hi tosomne & gewunodon, þæt hi in drihtnes gesihþe offredon mid heora benum & ferdon mid þære tunecan him gebiddende geond heora æcras, & þonne sona heom wæs seald se regn, se þe fullice mihte þa eorðan wel gehyrtan.
Of þære wisan mæg beon wel ongyten, hwilc mægn his sawl hæfde in hire, & in hwylcre geearnunge se wæs innan, þæs þe æteowde his gegyrla utan & acyrde fram þam burhleodum þæt yrre ures scyppendes.

Eac hit gelamp nu niwan in Suðlangbeardum, þæt sum swiðe arwyrþe wer, þam wæs nama Martinus, se lædde ancerlif in Marsico þam munte & þær wæs manig gær ana belocen in þam nearwestan scræfe, þone cuðon manega ura geferena & eac full oft wæron andwearde his þeawum & dædum.
In þam eac fela þinga ic ongæt fram minum foregengan þære eadigan gemynde papan Pelagio, & eac swa me sædon oþre æfæste weras.
Þis wæs his æreste wundor, þæt sona swa he hine sylfne brohte in þæt þyrl þæs forecwedenan muntes, þær forð ræsde wætres dropa of ðam ylcan stane, in þam wæs þæt holg þæs nearwan scræfes.
Þæt wæter genihtsumode Martino þam Godes þeowe to dæghwamlicum bryce, & naþær ne hit næs læsse ne mare, þonne hit þearf wæs.
In ðære wisan se ælmihtiga God gecyþde, hu swiðe he dyde gymnesse his þeowes, þam þe he gegearwode drync in þam westene of heardum stane.
Ac se ealda feond manna cynnes æfæstgende his godra weorca ongan syrwian, hu he sceolde þisne mid his scincræfte of þam scræfe adrifan.
Ða soðlice becreap þærinn to þam halgan men sum swyðe unhyre næddre & ongan mid gedonum brogan þone Godes þeowan ut adrifan of ðære eardunge.
Seo nædre ongan slincan in þæt scræf & com þider ana, & þær heo hi astrehte beforan þam halgan were, þe hine þær gebæd ana, & heo ðær gereste mid him restendum.
& se halga wer eallinga unforht aþenede his fot & his hand to þære næddran muðe & þus cwæð: gif þu hwylce leafe habbe me to sleanne & to wundianne ne wyrne ic þe þæs.
& hit þa þus seo nædre & se halga wer singallice heoldon þreora gæra fyrst betweoh heom.

Þa sume dæge se ealda feond agrimetede & hine gebealh oferswiþed mid swa mycelre strengðe þæs halgan weres, & heo þa seo nædre sænde hi selfe in forspildnesse geond þa widgellan sidan þæs muntes & forbærnde ealle þa treowa ðære stowe mid þy ligge, þe of hire eode.

& þa on ðære wisan, þe heo forbærnde ealle þa sidan þæs muntes, wæs ongyten, þæt heo wæs genyded fram þam ælmihtigan drihtne, þæt heo scolde cyðan, hwylcre geearnunge se wæs, þe hi oferswiðde & aweg adraf.
Gehyge nu, Petrus, ic þe bidde, hwylces modes heannesse þes drihtnes wer gestode, se læg & reste þreora gæra fyrst sorhleas mid þære nædran.
Petrus cwæð: ic forhtige for þissere gehyrnesse.

Gregorius him andswarode: þes ylca þæs arwyrðan lifes wer geþohte & geteohhode on þære frumtide his inbetynednesse, þæt he ofer þæt nan wif ne gesawe, nalles þæt he oferhogode þone wifhad, ac forþon þe he him ondred, þæt he sceolde geyrnan on ða uncyste deofles costunge, gif he sceawode hire onsyne.
Þa geacsode þæt sum wif & stah þa bealdlice upp on þone munt & forð eode scamleaslice to þæs halgan mannes scræfe.
& he þa forð lociende wel feor geseah on ðæs wifes hrægl, þe þyder gangende wæs.
Sona he hine sylfne astrehte in his gebed & asette his hleor on ða eorðan & þær læg forð astreht, oþ þæt þæt scamlease wif geswænced aweg gewat fram þam ehþyrle his cytan.

& heo þa þy ylcan dæge, sona swa heo of þam munte ofdune astah, hire lif geendode, þæt hit wæs efne gewislice ongyten of ðam dome hire deaðes, þæt þam ælmihtigan Gode swiðe mislicode, þæt heo sceolde geunrotsian his þeowan mid hire scamleasre bælde.

Eac swylce hit gelamp on oðre tid, þæt manige men efeston mid æfæstlicre estfulnesse to þysum halgan were, & seo stig wæs swiðe neara on ðære widgellan sidan þæs muntes, seo gelædde þa onettendan men to ðæs arwyrðan weres cytan.

Þa gelamp hit, þæt an lytel cniht eode upp unwærlice on ðære nearwan stige gemang oðrum mannum, & þa he feoll of ðam ylcan munte, oð þæt he gehreas in ða dene, seo wæs under þam munte swa feor ofdune, swa man geseon mihte feorst.
Witodlice in ðære stowe se munt wæs swa mycelre heanesse, þæt þa mycclan treowa, þe on þære dene wæron, þuhton þam mannum, þe hi of þam munte gesawon, swylce lytle scealdþyfelas.
Þa wurdon hi swiðe gedrefede ealle, þe þyder upp comon to þam halgan were, & mid micclum ymbhogan seofedon, hwær se lichama þæs aslidenan cnihtes mihte beon funden.

Næs nænig man, þe aht elles gelyfde, buton he acweald wære, ne nænig man næs, þe þæs wende, þæt se lichama moste ætsomne gewunian, oþ þæt he eorðan gesohte, ac þæt he sceolde beon eall tosliten for þam clifstanum, þe þær gehwær ut sceorodon of þam munte.
& þa swa þeh wæs se cniht gesoht in þære dene & eac wæs funden nalles þæt an cwic, ac eac swylce æghwæs he wæs ansund.
Þa openlice wæs gecyþed eallum þam mannum, þæt se cniht ne mihte beon gedered, forþon þe hine bær & scylde in his fylle þæt gebed þæs arwyrðan weres Martines.

Soðlice æt þam scræfe þæs halgan mannes hlifode ofer mycel stanclif & swa hlifiende, swylce hit feallan wolde ofer sancte Martines cytan, & daga gehwylce, swylce hit beotode swa hreosende to his forwyrde.

Þa com to þysum stanclife Mæscator mid mycelre ceorla mænigu Armentaries swuster sunu þæs foremæran weres, & he þa bæd, þæt se Godes þeowa wære geeadmodod, þæt he of ðam scræfe ut eode, þæt he mihte of ðam munte alucan þæt hreosende clif, & þonne se Godes þeow ofer þæt eardode sorhleas in his gebedhuse.
& þa se Godes wer nænigra þinga him hyran nolde to þon þe he hine bæd, þæt he dyde, ac he hine sylfne ahydde in deogolran stowe þæs scræfes.
& ne þuhte nanum men þæs tweo, þæt gif þæt stanclif feolle, þæt hit ne ofsloge þæt scræf & eac Martinum acwealde.
Þa witodlice seo mænigo þara ceorla, þe þider comon, ongunnon trahtian, hwæðer hi mihton buton þæs halgan weres frecenesse þæt unmæte stanclif onweg aleoðian, þe him oferhlifode.

Eala, Petrus, þæt þæt wæs swiðe wundorlic wise, þæt hit gelamp semninga, þæt ealle þa men gesawon, þæt seo mycelnes þæs stanclifes, þe hi aweg don woldon, færinga wearð upp awegen fram þam mannum, þe hit ymb wunnon, & swa ahleop, þæt hit na gehran þæs scræfes hrofe, þe Martinus on wæs, ac feoll swiðe feorr, efne swylce hit fleonde wære þæs Godes weres deringe.
Þæt swa gedon mid þære ængellican þegnunge for hæse þæs ælmihtigan Godes ongyteð ælc ðara, þe geleaffullice gelyfað, þæt ealle þing sin gestihtode mid þære godcundan foresceawunge.

Eac þes halga wer, þa þa he ærest com on þone ylcan munt & næs þa gyt eardiende on þam belocenan scræfe, he geband him sylfum þone fot & mid iserne racenteage he gefæstnode on oðre healfe ðæs stanes, to ðon þæt him nære na alyfed ofer þæt furður to ganne, þonne swa swa þære racenteage længe aþened wæs.

& þa þa þæt se arwyrða wer Benedictus geacsode, þæs gemynd we dydon on þissere uferan bec, se him bebead þurh his agenne þegn & þus cwæð: gif þu sy Godes þeowa, ne binde þe seo isene racetæah, se þe nime Cristes racenteah.

Sona swa swa Martinus gehyrde Benedictus word, he tobræc hraðe þone fotcops, & swa þeh æfter þan he ne stop mid þy unbundenum fet ofer þa stowe, þe he hine ær wenede, þa þa he gebunden wæs, ac hine sylfne beeode swa him þearf wæs butan racenteage in swa mycclum landsticce ungebunden, swa he ær gebunden on wunode.

& mid þy he ongan eac swylce habban geongran, æfter þon þe he hine sylfne in þam scræfe beleac, & þa his geongran eardodon onsundran fram þæs halgan mannes scræfe & þær gewunodon, þæt hi heom wæter hlodon of anum pytte to bryce heora lifes.
Ac gelomlice wæs tobrocen se rap, in þam hangode se stoppa, þe man þæt wæter mid hlod.
Forþon hit wæs þus gedon, þæt þa gingran þæs halgan weres abædon þa racenteage, þe se drihtnes wer aspeon of his fet, & hi gefæstnodon to þam rape & gebundon to ðam wæterstoppan.

Witodlice hit gelamp, þæt syþþan of ðære tide se ilca rap wæs ælce dæge bedyped in þam wætre & swa þeh nane gemete næs he tobrocen, forðon þe se rap gehran þære racenteage þæs Godes weres, þe he hæfde on him swa myccle strengðe to adreoganne þa byrde.
Petrus cwæð: soðlice þas dæda me liciaþ, forþon hi wæron wundorlice & eac swiþe niwan gewordene.
Gregorius him andswarode: hit gelamp nu in urum tidum, þæt sum subdiacon wæs Buxentine þære cyrican, þam wæs nama Quadragesimus, se gewunode, þæt he læswode þam eowde his sceapa in Aurelia þam lande.
Be þæs dædum of swiðe soðsagoles weres gesægne me wæs cuþ swiðe wundorlic wise, & seo wæs swiðe deogollice gedon.
Soðlice in ðam dagum, þe se subdeacon dyde his sceapa gyminge in Aurelia þam lande, wæs sum swiðe arwyrðes lifes wer in ðam munte, þe is gehaten Argentarius.
Se wer underfeng munuchad & þone mid fægrum þeawum gefylde.
Witodlice þes hæfde him to gewunan, þæt he ælce gære wolde faran of Argentario þam munte to sancte Petres cyrican þæs apostola.
& þonne symble gebeah he to þance rihtre cumliðnesse to Quadragesimo þam subdiacone, swa swa he sylfa me sæde.

Þa sume dæge hit gelamp, þæt he com to þæs subdeacones huse, þæt næs naht feor fram þære cyrican, & þa wearð þær forðfered sumes earmes wifes ceorl, þone hi ne mihton byrgan, forþon þe him se æfen on sæt, ac hine þwogon & mid scytan bewundon, swa hit þeaw wæs.
& þa sæt þæt earma wif weres bedæled ofer þam lichaman hire forðferdan ceorles, seo ateah ealle þa niht in mycclum wopum.
& he þa se Goda man efensargode hire sare mid singalum stefnum his wopa.

& þa þa þæt wif swa lange weop & nænige gemete blinnan ne mihte, þa wæs se Godes wer onbryrded, þe Quadragesimus se subdeacon þær gefermode, & þus cwæð to him: eala þæt min sawl efensargaþ þises wifes sare.
Ac ic þe bidde, þæt þu arise, & wit þonne begen biddan, þæt God þysum wife geyþe.
Witodlice þa ferdon hi begen to þære neahcyrican & hi sylfe þær samod astrehton to heora gebede.
& þa þa hi lange hwile hi ðær gebædon, se Godes þeowa bæd Quadragesimum þone subdeacon, þæt hi þæt gebed gefyldon.
Soðlice gefyldum þam gebede to genam on ðam wife deorwyrðe þæs dustes dæl & dyde to þæs forðferdan lichaman & hine sylfne þær on gebed astrehte.
& þa he hine lange hwile gebæd, & swa þeh he nolde na mid ðam subdeacone his gebed gefyllan, swa swa he ær dyde, ac he sylfa sealde bletsunge & aras sona.
& þa forðon þe he bær on his swiðran hand þæt gesomnode dust, he genam aweg mid his wynstran hand þone wrigels, mid þy wæs bewrigen se andwlita þæs forðferdan mannes.
& þa þa þæt wif geseah þæt swa gedon, heo ongan swiðlice wiðcweðan & wundrian, hwæt he don wolde.
& he þa onweg adonum þam wrigelse gnad þa on ansyne þæs forðferdan mannes þæt dust.

& þa þa he lange hwile gnad, swa se deada man onfeng his sawle & aganode & his eagan untynde & þa him sylf upp sæt & awundrode, hwæt ymb hine sylfne gedon wære, efne swylce he of hefegum slæpe wære aweht.
Þa þa þis þæt wif geseah, þe þær mid swa mycclan heofe geswænced wæs, heo ongan for ðon fægnunge ma weopan & swyðor mid hire stefne hlydan on þam heofe.
Þa se drihtnes wer ongan hire styran mid gemetlicre steore & þus cwæð: swiga, wif, swiga.
Ac swa hwylc man swa eow acsige, hu þeos wise gedon wære, þonne cweðað ge þis an, þæt drihten selfa se hælenda Crist his sylfes weorc geworhte in þære wisan.
& þa þa he þis sæde, he eode ut of þam huse, & þa hraðe he forlet Quadragesimum þone subdeacon, swa þæt he in ðære stowe næfre ofer þæt him æteowde.
Ac he wæs fleonde þa woruldlican are & þæt þy dyde þe he nolde, þæt he æfre ofer þæt in þysum life wære gesewen þam mannum, þe hine gesawon þæt wundor wyrcan.

Petrus cwæð: ic nat, hu oþre men þis ongytað; witodlice ic wene, þæt þæt sy wundorlicre eallum oðrum wundrum, þæt þa deadan eft to life gecyrren, & hira sawle eft of deogolnesse to ðam lichaman beoþ gecyrde.

Gregorius him andswarode: gif we lociað to þam gesewenlicum þingum, þe swa geweorðað, we sceolan nyde þæt gelyfan. gif we þonne sceawiaþ & gehycgað þa ungesewenlican, butan tweon us byþ cuð, þæt þæt is mare wundor, þæt man mid þy worde þære halgan lare & mid þy fultume haligra gebeda þone synfullan man gecyrre fram his synnum, þonne man þone deadan lichaman eft awæcce.
In þysum mæn byð se lichama aweht, þe bið eft sweltende, in ðam mæn byþ seo sawl aweht, seo byþ lifigende in ecnesse.
Be þære wisan ic þe cyðe nu þa bysene be twam mannum, ac geþænc, in hwæþrum þara þu wene, þæt wære maran mægnes wundor geworden.
Witodlice we witon, þæt drihten awehte Lazares lichaman of deaðe, þone we gelyfað him wel getreowne, & eac he awehte Paulum þone apostol on his mode & hine gecyrde fram his synnum.

Þa witodlice æfter þæs lichaman æriste be Lazares wundrum & mægnum wæs ætswiged, & soðlice æfter þære sawle æriste ne mæg ure tydernes ymbfon & ongytan, hu mænigfealde wisan wæron gesæde in þære halgan spræce godcundra boca be sancte Paules mægnum & wundrum.
Þæt is þonne, þæt his þa wælgrimmestan geþohtas wæron gebigde to þam hnescan innoðum þære mildan arfæstnesse, & þæt he gewilnode, þæt he swulte for ðam broðrum, in þara deaðe he wæs ær gefeonde.
& eac, þæt he wæs gefylled mid þy wisdome ælces gewrites & þa gedemde, þæt he sylfa naht ne cuðe ne nyste buton þone hælendan Crist & þysne hogiendne & þrowiendne for ealles mancynnes hæle.

Þæt is eac gesæd, þæt he for Cristes lufan lustlice geþafode, þæt he wære mid gyrdum beswungen, & he wæs eac mid sweordum ehted, & þæt he eac wære heah & upp ahafen mid are ðæs apostolican hades, ac swa þeh his sylfes wyllan he wæs hleotend in ðam midle Cristes þegna.

& he wæs gelæded to þæs þriddan heofones deogolnessum, & þonne hraðe he bigde his modes eage þurh ymbhigd & eadmodnesse to gerihtanne & to gesettanne þone gemanan gesinsceppendra manna, & he þa þus cwæð: agylde se wer þam wife hire gedafenu, & eac gelice þæt wif þam were.
Eac hit is be him gesæd, þæt he wære geþeoded in gastlicre sceawunge to engla þreatum, & swa þeah he na forhogode, þæt he geþohte & stihtode lichamlicra manna dæda.
& eac hit gesæd is, þæt he gefægnode on his untrumnesse & him sylfum þæt licode, þæt he teonan þrowode, & he þæt cwæð, þæt him wære Criste þæt, þæt he lifde, & gestreon, þæt he swulte.
& eac hit awriten is þæt ilce, þæt he lifde in lichaman, hit wære efen þan þe he eallinga butan þam lichaman eall wære.
Geseoh nu forðon, Petrus, & geþenc, hu se lifde, þe gehwearf fram þære helle his modes to þære arfæstnesse lifes.

Forðon þæt is læsse wundor, þæt man hwylcne man in lichaman of deaðe awæcce, buton hit gelimpe, þæt se man þurh þæs lichaman gecwicunge sy gelæded to þæs modes life, þæt þis þonne sy gedon þurh þæt wundor, þæt he sy geliffæsted innan & gecyrred fram his unrihte.
Petrus cwæð: feorr beneoðan þan ic gelyfde þæt, þæt ic nu ongæt, hu swiþe unwiðmetendlice hit is bufan þon þe ic wende.
Ac ic þe bidde nu, þæt þu þa ongunnenan spræce forð sprece, & þæt þa hwile þe þu æmtige tid habbe, þæt us seo tid ne gewite butan þinre lare & trymnesse.

Gregorius him andswarode: sum broþor is gyt in ðisum mynstre mid me wuniende & lifigende, se is se an geornfullesta godcundra gewrita, & se is wintrum yldra þonne ic, & he gewunode, þæt he me sæde manig þing, þe ic sylf ær nyste.
Witodlice æt þises sage ic gehyrde & geleornode, þæt sum man wæs in Suðlangbeardna lande binnan feowertigum mila of Romebyrig, þam wæs nama Benedictus.
Se wæs wintrum geong & on his þeawum eald & gedefe, & he hine sylfne geteah & geheold stranglice & fæstlice in ðam regole þæs halgan weres.
Þone onfundon Gotan on ða tide Totillan þæs cyninges, & hi ða ongunnon syrwian, þæt hi woldon hine forbærnan samod mid his huse.
Þa wurpon hi fyr on þa hus & eall forbærndon, þæt in ðam ymbhwyrfte wæs þæs huses, & swa þeh þæs halgan mannes cyte ne mihte beon forbærned mid þy fyre.
Þa gesawon þæt þa Gotan, hi ongunnon ma reðian & hi gebelgan & þa ðone halgan man atugon ut of his huse.
Þa gesawon hi unfeor þanon ænne ofen inæledne, se wæs gegearwod to þon þæt man wolde on bacan.
Þa bescufon hi þone halgan man þærinn & fordytton þone ofn.
& þa oþre dæge wæs he gemeted swa gesund, swa he ær wæs, & nallæs þæt an, þæt his lichama wæs gesund for þy fyre, ac eac swylce ne mihton hi forbærnan nanra þinga his hrægles.
Petrus cwæð: nu ic gehyre, þæt þis is eft þara þreora cnihta, þe geo aworpene wæron in þone byrnendan ofen, & swa þeah þæt fyr hi aderian ne mihte.

Gregorius him andswarode : þæs þe ic wene þæt wundor wæs gedon of sumum dæle ungelice þisum, forþon þa þry cnihtas wæron aworpene in þæt fyr gebundenum heora fotum & handum, & þa oðre dæge sohte hi se cyning in þam ofne & hi þær gemette gangende æghwæs ungederede on heora gegerælan.
Of þære wisan wæs ongyten, þæt þæt fyr, þe hi in wæron bescofene, fornam heora bendas & ne dorste heora hræglum onhrinan.
Swa hit gelamp on þa ylcan tid, þæt se lig gehæfde his mægn in þara rihtwisra cnihta þegnunge to heora frofre & fultume & hit habban ne mihte to heora wite & tintregum.
Þisum ealdum wundrum gelamp in urum dagum gelic wise, þeh þe hit of ungelicre gesceafte gewurde.
Soðlice nu niwan Iohannes se gerefa me cyþde mid his agenre sægne, þæt Pronulphus se ealdorman wære in þa tid mid Autharico þam cyninge, þær gelamp wundorlic wise.
& se ealdorman cyðde, þæt he him sylfa þær æt wære & þa wisan ongeate & oncneowe, & se forecwedena gerefa hit æt his muðe gehyrde.
Se hit me sæde & þus cwæð, þæt nu for fif gærum hit gelumpe on Romebyrig, þæt Tifrestream wæs upp gangende & swa swiðe weaxende ofer þa weallas & in ðære byrig þa mæstan land abysgodon.
Swa eac swylce Attesis seo ea wæs weaxende æt Ueronense þære byrig, oð þæt heo becom to þæs halgan martires & biscopes cyrican Zenonis.

Þære cyrcan dura wæron þa opene, & swa þeh ne mihte þæt wæter in þa cyrican yrnan, ac hit wæs weaxende, oþ þæt hit becom upp to þam fenestrum, þa wæron forneah æt þam hrofe, & swa þæt wæter wæs standende & beleac þa duru þære cyrican, efne swylce seo wætergesceaft wære onwænded in fæstes wages staðolfæstnysse.
Eac þær wæron manige men inne, þa þa seo cyrice wæs utan ymbseald mid þæs wætres mycelnesse.
Hi nyston, hwider hi mihton ut gan, & heom forðon ondredon, þæt hi sceoldon beon geswæncte mid þurste & mid hungre.
& þa eodon hi to ðære cyrcan dura & þær hlodon heom drincan.
& þæt wæter weox upp to ðam fenestrum, swa ic ær bufan sæde, & swa þeah hit ne mihte nænigra þinga flowan in to ðære circan.

Eala, Petrus, þæt þæt wæs mycel wundor, þæt þæt wæter mihte beon hladen swa swa wæter & ne mihte flowan swa wæter, ac hit stod beforan þære dura, to ðon þæt hit cyðde eallum þam mannum þa geearnunge þæs halgan martyres Zenones.
Hit wæs wæter to fultume & to helpe þam mannum, þe in ðære cyrican wæron, & swylce hit wæter nære in ða stowe to farane.
Forþon ic sæde ær, þæt þis nære ungelic þam ealdan wundre þæs ær gesædan fyres, þæt forbærnde ða bændas þara þreora cnihta & ne gehran heora hræglum.
Petrus cwæð: swiðe wundorlices mægnes weras wæron in Suðlangbeardum.
Ic wolde witan, hwæðer hit gelumpe, þæt hi nænige searwe þæs ealdan feondes aræfnedan, þæt hi þonne for ðam searwum swa forð geþungon.
Gregorius him andswarode: ne byð næfre nænig lean þæs sigores, buton hit sy mid gewinne gecampod.
Hwanon furðor beoð halige men sigorfæste, nymðe hi campian & feohtan wið þam searwum þæs ealdan feondes?

Witodlice se awyrgda gast symble ætstandeþ urum geþance & ure spræce & urum dædum; ac gif hit gelimpeð, þæt he hwæt unrihtlices on ðan findeð, he wilnað, þæt he mid þy geweorðe ure wregend & wrohtbora beforan þam dome þæs ecan deman.
Wilt ðu nu witan, hu he symble us ætstandeþ to æswice?

Sume þa þe nu mid us syndon, us cyðdon þa wisan, þe ic nu secgan wille, þæt swiðe arwyrðes lifes wer wære, þam nama Stephanus, se wæs mæssepreost in ðære mægðe Ualeria, þyses ures deacones & ure cyrican stihtere Bonefacies se nihsta mæg.
Se mæssepreost com sume dæge ham of siðfæte, & þa he eode in his hus, he cleopode receleaslice to his þeowtlinge & cwæð: cum, deoful, hider & unsco me.

Þa sona swa he hit gecweden hæfde, þa þwangas þara scona ongunnon heom sylfe toslupan mid mycelre hrædnesse, efne þæt hit openlice wæs cuð, þæt se ylca deofol, þe þær genemned wæs, him hyrde þa scos of to donne.
Ac sona swa þæt se mæssepreost geseah, he aforhtode swiþlice & mid mycclum stefnum ongan clypian & þus cweðan: gewit, yrming, fram me, gewit.
Ne spræc ic na to ðe, ac to minum þeowetlinge.
Sona swa se deofol eft his stefne gehyrde, he gewat onweg þanon, & swa þa gewunedon þa þwangas, swylce hi þær gemette wæron of mycclum dæle untogone & onleoðode.
Ongyt nu, Petrus, on þære wisan, þæt se ealda feond, þe swa swiðe andweard byð urum lichamlicum dædum, hu swiðe he on symbel gefeleð urum geþohtum mid his searwum.
Petrus cwæð: swiðe gewinnfullic þæt is & ondrysnlic, þæt man on symbel hine behealde wiþ þæs feondes searwe & singallice do, swylce he on gefeohte stande.

Gregorius him andswarode: ne byð hit na swa gewinfullic, gif we us selfum ne sellað ure heordnesse, ac þære upplican Godes gife, swa þæt we wacian swa swiðe swa we magon under his gescyldnesse & mundbyrde.

Witodlice gif se ealda feond onginneþ beon adrifen of ðæs mannes mode mid þære godcundan gyfe, þonne full oft gelimpeð hit, þæt nalles þæt an, þæt se feond ofer þæt ne þearf beon ondræded, ac eac swylce he sylfa byð afyrhted & abreged mid þy mægne godra weorca þara manna, þe rihtlice & wel heora lif lifiað.
Þære wisan, þe ic þe nu secgan wille, wæs gewita se ealda & se halga fæder Eleutherius, þæs gemynd ic herbufan dyde.
Se ylca þis me sæde, þæt sum æþela mæden wære in Spolitana þære byrig sumes ealdormannes dohter, seo wæs inæled mid þy luste þæs heofonlican lifes.
& þa ongan se fæder wyrnan hire & wolde forstandan þone weg þæs ecan lifes.
Ac heo forhogode þæs fæder lare & onfeng þam hade þæs halgan mynsterlifes.
For ðære wisan þa gewearð, þæt se fæder hi bedælde his speda & naht elles hire ne sealde buton VI yntsan anre æhte.
Þa soðlice mid hire bysene wæron forð gecigde manige oðre æþeles cynnes fæmnan & ongunnon beon to hire gecyrde & þeowian ðam ælmihtigan drihtne mid heora þy gehalgodan mægðhade.
Þa sume dæge se ylca abbud þæs arwyrðan lifes Eleutherius eode to þære fæmnan mid gife þære godcundan lare & trymnesse, & heo sæt samod sprecende mid þam ylcan Godes were.
Þa semninga com an ceorl mid lace of ðam ylcan staðole, þe heo ær onfeng VI yntsan æt hire fæder.
& þa þa se ceorl gestod beforan hire & þam arwyrðan abbode, þa wearð he færinga geþread fram þam awyrgdan gaste & feoll þa þær beforan heom & ongan beon swiðe geswænced mid gristbitingum & gehlowum.
Þa aras seo halige fæmne & mid yrrum ansyne & mid mycclum cleopungum bebead þam deofle & þus cwæð: aga, yrming, ut of ðysum mæn.
Aga, yrming, ut of þysum men.
Þa sona andswarode se deofol þære fæmnan & þus cwæð: gif ic of ðisum ceorle ut ga, in hwylcne gange ic eft?
Þa geeode hit swa, þæt þær wæs neah sum iung swyn feded.
Þa bebead seo halige nunfæmne þus cweðende: gang þu of þysum ceorle & ga þe in þis swin.
& þa sona se deofol gewat ut of þam mæn & for in þæt swyn, swa him beboden wæs, & þæt acwealde & him þa onweg gewat.
Petrus cwæð: ic wolde witan, hwæþer he sceolde eallinga þæt swin gesellan þam unclænan gaste.
Gregorius him andswarode: þære dæde þysre ure forðbrohtan bysne wæron gelice þy wyrde þære soþfæstnesse.
Soðlice to urum alysende sylfum wæs gecweden fram þam deofla heapa, þe þone wedenseocan man ofseten hæfde: gif þu us ut adrife of þysum men, sænd us in þysra swyna heap.
& he þa se hælend þone heap adraf of þam mæn & heom forgæf, þæt hi eodon in ða swyn & gebrohton þa in þæs sæs neowolnesse.
For ðære wisan mæg beon oncnawen, þæt butan þæs ælmihtigan Godes gife & leafe se awyrgda gast næfð nænigne mihte wið þam men, se þe ne mihte in þa swyn gan, buton him alyfed wære.

Forðon us is nydþearf, þæt we þam ælmihtigan Gode ura sylfra willan syn underþeodde, þam þe ealle wiðerwearde þing mid nyde wæron underþeodde, to þon þæt we syn swa myccle strangran wið urum feondum, swa myccle ma we gefremede beoð under eadmodnesse to þære samodwiste þæs ordfruman eallra gesceafta.

Hwylc wundor is þæt forðon, þeh þe hwylce Godes gecorenra, þa hwile þe hi in lichaman beoð gesette, magon wyrcan manige wundra, eac swilce we witon, þæt full oft þara deadan ban lifiað & mære weorðað mid manigum wundrum?
Witodlice in Ualeria þære mægðe þeos wise wæs geworden, þe ic nu secgan wille, & heo is me cuð of gesægene þære eadigan gemynde Ualentines mines abbodes.

He hit þus sæde, þæt in Ualeria þam lande wære sum mæssepreost, se mid his preostum lædde swiðe clænlice þæt lif þæs halgan drohtoðes & wæs symble geornfull & behealden in Godes hyrnessum & godum weorcum.
Þa þa him to com se dæg his forðfore, he wæs bebyrged beforan ðære cyrcan.
& on ðære ylcan circan wæron onfæste þa eowestran þara broðra sceapa.
& þonne seo ilca stow, in ðære þe wæs se mæssepreost bebyrged, wæs se weg þam mannum, þe to ðam sceapum eodon.
Þa sumre nihte singendum þam preostum in þære cyrican, com se þeof & eode in ða eawestran & þær genam ænne weðer & eft hraðe ut eode.
Þa he þa com to þære stowe, þe se drihtnes wer inne bebyrged wæs, þa sæmninga he cleofode on ðære eorðan & ne mihte na onstyrian his fet to ganne.
